name: material-identifier
title: Material Identifier
comments: An important point to note is that properties of the adms:Identifier class are properties of the Identifier, not the resource that it identifies or the agency that issued it.
rdfs:comment: In RDF this is expressed using the adms:Identifier class with the following properties: 1) the content string should be provided using skos:notation, datatyped with the identifier scheme (including the version number if appropriate); 2) use dcterms:creator to link to a class describing the agency that manages the identifier scheme or adms:schemaAgency to provide the name as a literal.

fields.name: materialEntityID
fields.title: Material Entity ID
fields.comments: Values of dwc:materialEntityID are intended to uniquely and persistently identify a particular dwc:MaterialEntity within some context. Examples of context include a particular sample collection, an organization, or the worldwide scale. Recommended best practice is to use a persistent, globally unique identifier. The identifier is bound to a physical object (a dwc:MaterialEntity) as opposed to a particular digital record (representation) of that physical object.
fields.rdfs:comment: An identifier for a particular instance of a dwc:MaterialEntity.

fields.name: identifier
fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: An unambiguous reference to a resource within a given context.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to identify a resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.
fields.rdfs:comment: A notation is a string of characters such as "T58.5" or "303.4833" used to uniquely identify a concept within the scope of a given concept scheme.

fields.name: identifierType
fields.title: Identifier Type
fields.description: A category or system that best matches the nature of an identifier (skos:notation).
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.

fields.name: identifierTypeIRI
fields.title: Identifier Type IRI
fields.description: An IRI of a controlled vocabulary value for a type of identifier.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an IRI for a term in a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The nature or genre of the resource.

fields.name: identifierTypeSource
fields.title: Identifier Type Source
fields.description: A reference to a controlled vocabulary in which the definition of a value in dwc:identifierType is given.
fields.rdfs:comment: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.

fields.name: identifierLanguage
fields.title: Identifier Language
fields.description: A language in which an identifier is presented.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use an ISO639-2 three-letter language code.
